channel.title: When i run server [PI]
channel.description:
when i run my server i get..
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8133 at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:43) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.(Server.java:71) Loaded clipmap in 34ms. [5/30/11 7:07 PM]: Launching OzhcScape... [5/30/11 7:07 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 29ms. [5/30/11 7:07 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594

item.title: When i run server [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

h3rbl0re:

So what do i do to fix it? i dont understand.

Npc.cfg and change the drop for 8133 to something lower than what its at.

Read full topic

item.title: When i run server [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

It means that the id 8133 in NPCDrops.java on line 43 is too high.

Read full topic
